oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John H. and Granville Grogan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John H. and Granville Grogan images. The two images are framed together in a single frame. John H. and Granville Grogan were brothers who served in the 7th Tenn. Cav. Regt, USA. They were home on furlough in West Tennessee when they were murdered by partisans. The brothers are buried at New Liberty Church Cemetery in Carroll County, Tennessee.
